Settings.YouAreCurrentlyLoggedInAs: You are currently logged in as
Settings.SignInToYourModrinthAccount: Sign in to your Modrinth account.
Settings.TheDirectoryWhereTheLauncherStoresAllOfI: The directory where the launcher stores all of its files.
Settings.EnablesAdvancedRendering:
Enables advanced rendering such as blur effects that may cause performance issues
            without hardware-accelerated rendering.
Settings.MinimizeTheLauncher: Minimize the launcher when a Minecraft process starts.
Settings.UseSystemWindowFrame: Use system window frame (app restart required).
Settings.ChangeThePageToWhichTheLauncherOpensOn: Change the page to which the launcher opens on.
Settings.ChangeColor: Change the global launcher color theme.
Settings.McdDesc:
The maximum amount of files the launcher can download at the same time. Set this to a
            lower value if you have a poor internet connection.
Settings.McwDesc:
The maximum amount of files the launcher can write to the disk at once. Set this to a
            lower value if you are frequently getting I/O errors.
Settings.AnalyticsDesc:
Modrinth collects anonymized analytics and usage data to improve our user experience and
            customize your experience. By enabling this option, you opt out and your data will no
            longer be collected.
Settings.DisableRPCDesc:
Disables the Discord Rich Presence integration. 'Modrinth' will no longer show up as a
            game or app you are using on your Discord profile. This does not disable any
            instance-specific Discord Rich Presence integrations, such as those added by mods.
Settings.JavaMemDesc: The memory allocated to each instance when it is ran.
Settings.PreLaunchDesc: Ran before the instance is launched.
Settings.FullScreenDesc: Overwrites the options.txt file to start in full screen when launched.
Settings.WidthDesc: The width of the game window when launched.
Settings.HeightDesc: The height of the game window when launched.

AccountsCard.PasteMS: Paste the copied code in the browser on the Microsoft page.
AccountsCard.TryAgainError: Unfortunately, we cannot accept such a username, please try again!
AccountsCard.UnexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred, please try again.

Options.DeleteQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete this instance?
Options.DeleteQuestionDesc: If you proceed, all data for your instance will be removed. You will not be able to recover it.
Options.UnlockQuestion: Are you sure you want to unlock this instance?
Options.UnlockProceed: If you proceed, you will not be able to re-lock it without using the `Reinstall modpack` button.
Options.UnpairQuestion: Are you sure you want to unpair this instance?
Options.UnpairProceed: If you proceed, you will not be able to re-pair it without creating an entirely new instance.
Options.Name: Name
Options.EditMLGVDesc: Allows you to change the mod loader, loader version, or game version of the instance.
Options.CategoriesDesc:
Set the categories of this instance, for display in the library page. This is purely
          cosmetic.
Options.WidthDesc: The width of the game window when launched.
Options.HeightDesc: The height of the game window when launched.
Options.FullScreenDesc: Make the game start in full screen when launched (using options.txt).
Options.PreLaunchDesc: Ran before the instance is launched.
